text: Danny Leshem () is an Israeli entrepreneur and venture capitalist. ==Career== In 2005, Leshem co-founded Kidaro, a startup company that helped big businesses manage their employees' computers. Microsoft bought Kidaro in 2008. In 2010, he co-founded OpenRest, a company that helped restaurants take orders online. Wix.com bought OpenRest in 2014, and Leshem worked there until 2018. Since 2018, Leshem has been investing in startup companies. In 2021 he started INT3, an Israeli venture capital fund. == References == == Other websites == *Official homepage
title: Danny Leshem
